configurations.name: bootstrap_server
configurations.description: Kafka Broker Server Address.

configurations.name: producer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic to which the scheduling service will produce schedules.

configurations.name: consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic to which the scheduling service will consume status and intent updates.

configurations.name: spat_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic to which the scheduling service will consume modified spat.

configurations.name: group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group ID.

configurations.name: intersection_type
configurations.description: The type of the intersection, e.g., stop_controlled_intersection, signalized_intersection

configurations.name: exp_delta
configurations.description: Time(in milliseconds) without receiving status & intent updates after which a vehicle is no longer considered!

configurations.name: stop_distance
configurations.description: Maximum distance(in meters) from the end of an entry-lane at which point a vehicle can be considered stopped.

configurations.name: stop_speed
configurations.description: Maximum speed(in m/s) of vehicle for considering vehicle stopped at intersection.

configurations.name: max_valid_speed
configurations.description: Maximum speed(in m/s) of vehicle for consideration for scheduling.

configurations.name: scheduling_delta
configurations.description: Time(in seconds) interval between scheduling calculations.

configurations.name: flexibility_limit
configurations.description: This limit controls how much departure position can change for any given vehicle between successive intersection schedule calculations.

configurations.name: entering_time_buffer
configurations.description: The time it takes a vehicle stopped before the stop bar at an entry lane to exit the entry lane and enter the link lane once given access

configurations.name: enable_schedule_logging
configurations.description: Bool flag to enable schedule calculation csv logging.

configurations.name: schedule_log_path
configurations.description: File path where schedule calculation csv file will be written(Note: set enable_schedule_logging true).

configurations.name: schedule_log_filename
configurations.description: Filename for schedule calculation csv logging (Note: set enable_schedule_logging true).

configurations.name: sleep_millisecs
configurations.description: Current thread sleep for milliseconds

configurations.name: int_client_request_attempts
configurations.description: Number of attempts intersection client sending the HTTP request to get response with valid signal group ids.

configurations.name: initial_green_buffer
configurations.description: The time buffer in milliseconds to apply to the time when the phase will become green to avoid vehicles that are ahead of schedule entering before the phase is green.

configurations.name: final_green_buffer
configurations.description: Additional buffer in milliseconds for the end of a green phase that allows additional safety on top of the yellow clearance and red clearance.
